//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowTexture;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float2 SpotAngles;
//   float3 SpotDirection;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNEResolution                c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c7       1
//   SpotDirection                c8       1
//   SpotAngles                   c9       1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s3       1
//   ShadowTexture                s4       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, -0.649999976, 0.5, 1, 0
    def c5, 0.0625, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord5 v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v3.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed CRC32_1CA71C48_166.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    texld r0, v1, s3
    add r0, r0.w, c2.x
    texkill r0
    texld_pp r0, v0, s4
    dp3 r1.x, v2, v2
    rsq r1.y, r1.x
    mul r1.yzw, r1.y, v2.xxyz
    dp3 r1.y, r1.yzww, -c8
    add r1.y, r1.y, -c9.x
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, c9.y
    mul_pp r0.z, r1.y, r1.y
    mov_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mov r0.yw, c2.y
    texld_pp r2, r0, s0
    texld_pp r0, r0.zwzw, s0
    add r0.y, -r1.x, c2.z
    mul r0.y, r2.x, r0.y
    mul r3, r0.x, r0.y
    mov r4, r3
    texkill r4
    if b0
      mad r0.yz, vPos.xxyw, c0.xxyw, c0.xzww
      mul r3.xy, r0.yzzw, v3.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r4, c5, s1
        add r0.y, -r4.y, v3.w
        mad r3.z, r4.x, r0.y, r3.x
        mov r3.xy, r3.zyzw
        mov r0.y, v3.w
      else
        mov r0.y, v3.w
      endif
      rcp r0.y, r0.y
      mul r0.yz, r0.y, r3.xxyw
      mad r0.yz, r0, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r4, r0.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r4.xxyz, r4.xxyz
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r0, r2.x
    else
      mov_pp r0.yzw, r2.x
    endif
    mov_sat r1.x, r1.x
    add r1.x, -r1.x, c2.z
    pow_sat_pp r2.x, r1.x, c7.w
    mov r2.y, c2.y
    texld_pp r1, r2, s0
    mul r0.yzw, r0, c4.xxyz
    mul r0.yzw, r0, c7.xxyz
    mul r0.yzw, r1.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww
    cmp oC0.xyz, -r3.w, c2.w, r0
    mov oC0.w, c2.w

// approximately 58 instruction slots used (7 texture, 51 arithmetic)
